s.text: It may also explain the expression "scared stiff" (in the sense of tumescent, not in the sense of immobilized by drunken overindulgence in a gift bottle of bourbon that one never received).

Complete this expression of amazement from Dr. Francis Collins of the National Institutes of Health, "I don't often pick up a scientific paper and find myself getting chills, as I did when I saw _______________."
The total number of human genes is estimated at between 60,000 and 120,000.
The total number of human genes is estimated at between 60,000 and 120,000.
The total number of human genes is estimated at between 60,000 and 120,000.
The total number of human genes is estimated at between 60,000 and 120,000.
